bullets.text: US-China tariffs/trade controls escalate; Fed Beige Book says tariffs lifting prices and squeezing consumers, adding inflationary pressure.
Supreme Court signals skepticism of Voting Rights Act protections, potentially enabling partisan gerrymanders that could hand House control to Republicans.
U.S. plans broader control of companies to counter China’s rare-earth dominance, expanding industrial policy and supply-chain security measures.
Bunge jumps 11% after Trump mulls China cooking oil embargo, highlighting commodity market sensitivity to escalating trade weaponization.
Federal judge blocks Trump from firing civil servants during shutdown, preserving government capacity and stabilizing services near-term.
Bank of America beats expectations with 43% surge in investment banking revenue, signaling dealmaking rebound across Wall Street.
Nvidia, Microsoft, xAI, BlackRock back $40B Aligned Data Centers deal, underscoring massive capital flooding into AI infrastructure.
Apple debuts M5 chip across MacBook Pro, iPad Pro, Vision Pro, promising major AI performance gains.
Walmart rolling out millions of IoT sensors nationwide, a first at retail scale, targeting operational efficiency and loss reduction.
U.S. Army launches program to deploy small nuclear reactors; sector stocks mixed as policy support grows.
United Airlines sees premium travelers driving record revenue; earnings beat on profit outlook despite revenue shortfall.
Researchers unlock century-old quantum effect to boost solar efficiency, potentially enabling more powerful photovoltaics.
Physicists discover a new class of time crystal, advancing nonequilibrium physics with potential quantum computing applications.
Hamas returns all recoverable hostage remains; amid truce, it violently suppresses rivals in Gaza, complicating regional stability.
Trump authorizes covert CIA action in Venezuela, risking escalation and regional backlash amid ongoing U.S.–Latin America tensions.
